concept.title: 5228.305 Overseas workers' compensation and war-hazard insurance.

conbody.p: (d) Submit requests for waiver through DASN(P) by email at usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] PGI 288.305- Overseas Workers' Compensation and War-Hazard Insurance Waiver.”
